price: Waambie waja wangu ya kwamba Mimi ndiye Mwenye kusamehe, Mwenye kurehemu.
arabic: ۞ نَبِّئۡ عِبَادِيٓ أَنِّيٓ أَنَا ٱلۡغَفُورُ ٱلرَّحِيمُ
footnotes: Ewe Nabii muaminifu! Wape khabari waja wangu wote kwamba Mimi ni Mwingi wa kughufiria na kusamehe kwa mwenye kutubu, akaamini, na akatenda mema. Na kwamba Mimi ni Mwingi wa kuwarehemu.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: nabbi ʿibādī annī anā al-ghafūru al-raḥīmu
